121802944.author: LuisYo Alvarado
121802944.text: These last few days have been a roller coaster of emotions. Some of my neighbors lost their homes. Road access is limited and many streets don't exist anymore. We might be un communicated for a while, since there is no electricity, water or reliable telecommunications, but I'm here reporting me and my family are safe. #hurricanemaria #huracanmaria

121802944.author: LuisYo Alvarado
121802944.text:
Hola mundo. Estoy bien, al igual que la familia Alvarado Ortiz, Rivera Alvarado y Mercado Alvarado. Abuelo Fonso y Crucita también están bien, aunque no hay mucho acceso para su casa.

For printouts, you'd need to trust the source of the physical documents, which is almost never an issue for hospitals, courthouses, etc. For...

6301925.author: Brandon Goldman was pondering life's hard questions.
6301925.text:
A deep dish pizza is either a savory pie or an open-faced sandwich, not a pizza. Probably a pie.
A pizza turned upside down on top of another pizza becomes a melt, not a pizza. Specifically a pizza-flavored melt, which is a kind of sandwich.
Some people might think a pizza folded over becomes a calzone. However, a calzone requires all edges to be sealed, so this is actually a sandwich. If the edges were crimped after folding it over, it would become a calzone.
A calzone is arguably a large,...

100000130417227.author: Kelvin Veras shared Ethan Ciment's post.
100000130417227.text:
Ethan Ciment
THE SALVATION ARMY IS NOT A CHARITY! They are an evangelical protestant church which uses donated money to actively oppress gay civil rights. They have threatened to close their New York soup kitchens that serve tens of thousands of New Yorkers if they are forced to adhere to civil rights laws when dealing with gay employees. They spend your money lobbying governments to prevent LGBT rights and legislation. Please research a charity before blindly giving to them.

1341600139.text: There will never be a point in your life where its the right time to do a great thing. If you are waiting for that perfect moment, that perfect timing its not going to happen. You have to go out and create the perfect time and the perfect opportunity, and the perfect situation. Do not become satisfied or comfortable with where you are in life, because success will rarely exceed your level or personal development, because success is something you attract by the person you become.

1341600139.author: Grant Cardone
1341600139.date: When I realized these things were not improving my life, my business, or getting me closer to my dreams I stopped...
1341600139.text:
Millions of people will be out tonight... partying, shopping, dancing, eating—blowing their money and damaging their body just to wake late up tomorrow hungover and unproductive.
I know, because I wasted too many weekends doing the same thing and I believed it was my right to celebrate. I earned the money that was in my pocket. The truth was—I didn't have anything real to celebrate.

1341600139.author: Paul Jon Siljee
1341600139.text: This morning my Aunt Marie lost her battle with lung cancer. The crazy thing is she never even smoked a cigarette but her family members always did. Few months ago the Doctors gave her only a few days to live and she ended up fighting her battle an extra few months. She was the most generous, kind, loving and energetic person I've ever met. Even down to her last breathes she was making us laugh. Heaven gained another Angel today and I gained another hero today. I hope I could be half of what she was someday. RIP Aunt Marie

6. Girls fighting over prom dresses

698847195.author: U.S. Senator Bernie Sanders
698847195.date: To the degree that Mr. Trump is serious...
698847195.text: Donald Trump tapped into the anger of a declining middle class that is sick and tired of establishment economics, establishment politics and the establishment media. People are tired of working longer hours for lower wages, of seeing decent paying jobs go to China and other low-wage countries, of billionaires not paying any federal income taxes and of not being able to afford a college education for their kids - all while the very rich become much richer.

686394849.text:
This is a real life convo had today at the Albright household. Parties will remain unidentified. Background: an XL Papa Johns Pizza was delivered to the house.
- where you going?
- take this box to the trash?
- the trash? Why are you throwing the pizza out?
- I ate it all.
- you ate the entire XL pepperoni pizza?
- yeah. That's what happens when Florida scores a last second touch down.
🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣❤️🖤🤦‍♂️🤦🏼‍♀️🐊🍕🍕🍕

686394849.author: Amanda Prater Albright
686394849.text:
Mother's Day is such a weird day for me.... I love hearing about all the loving bonds formed and LOVE to see Mom's being appreciated. But I can't help but reflect: my Mom is a dead beat. Couple that with the fact that I have not been blessed with my own children. It's kind of a sad day for me.
Focusing on what I do have: I do have a kick-ass Grama, Sandy, who raised a son who didn't need woman to help him raise two amazing women. I also have a strong MIL, Joyce, who raised an honorable and...

686394849.author: Amanda Prater Albright
686394849.text:
Week one of my "social cleanse":
Dinners at home, long walks alone and with dogs, dedicated reading time, and couples giving day at the Food Bank. Plus, I got to hear a very inspirational speaker last night.
My life is so full of things to do, I'm often too frazzled to appreciate the little and hell, the big things too. #intentionalliving
P.S. I love Dr. Teal's Epsom Salt Detox & Energy Blend Body Wash.

686394849.author: Carly Fiorina
686394849.date: He admitted that 110 emails on the server were classified at the time they were...
686394849.text:
Today, the FBI admitted that Hillary Clinton endangered the American people—and confirmed that the worst things any of us imagined about Hillary’s email server were true.
FBI Director James Comey concluded that Clinton was “extremely careless” in handling our nation’s secrets.
He admitted that no reasonable person could have believed putting these emails on a private server was at all appropriate or acceptable.
